p:
The B-cH9/1 is based on a recombinant B/Yamagata/16/88 backbone with an HA that features the HA stalk domain from H1N1 strain A/Puerto Rico/8/34 and the head domain from H9N2 strain A/guinea fowl/Hong Kong/WF10/99. The HA segment was constructed as described by Hai and colleagues
47 and was first described in.
13
